title: La m\'ethode de Shintani et ses variantes
abstract:
We give several versions of Shintani's method for the decomposition into
simplicial cones of the fundamental domain of a torus modulo a lattice, and we
investigate some applications to the study of Hecke $L$-functions at integer
points. In particular, we prove the analytic class number formula for a totally
real field, directly at $s=0$.
